name: Tapestry
tagline: A CSS / LESS Dashboard UI framework created for Websilk, a drag & drop web development platform
body:
Create an elegant & responsive **website & dashboard** using Tapestry as your core CSS framework. Simply copy & paste HTML markup from our [UI Showcase](http://www.github.com/websilk/tapestry/) directly into your web pages. ### How it works * Add **tapestry.css** to the head of your website. This file contains a 12 column grid system along with styling for all the UI elements and supports three different sizes of UI elements (small, medium, & large). * Choose one of the theme CSS files to add to the head of your website. * Load the **tapestry.js** library at the foot of your website * A theme is a list of CSS coloring rules that are applied to the tapestry UI. The Theme Factory LESS file takes a list of HEX color variables from your Theme LESS file and generates all the coloring rules for the UI. ### Features * **Simple Class Naming Structure** makes it easy to read your HTML markup. * Create your own custom themes by copying one of the Theme LESS files that comes with the framework, then modify a list of HEX colors. It's that easy. * Advanced users can modify the Tapestry LESS file to customize the look & feel of the UI. * Add coloring rules to the Theme Factory LESS file to alter the way the UI is colored. ### Example Grid
